column4: I'm having some difficulties with partitioning. I cannot remove my partitions, which causes great problems with the alternate installer. How can I remove any sign of any partitions?

I've deleted the partitions using gparted, I've deleted them using fdisk. I've created a new partition table in fdisk, and I've done the same in gparted. No matter what I do, the partitions keep coming back as if I'd never deleted them.
I have used both fdisk and gparted, but none of them seem to be able to remove the partitions.
